item.title: How to Update
item.description: ğŸ¤© All summaries are open source How to Contribute # We welcome contributions to the summaries. If you want to contribute, please follow the steps below: Fork the repository Make your changes Submit a pull request Structure # The summaries are written in Markdown and are stored in the content/en/docs/summaries directory. Each summary is a separate Markdown file.

item.title: Troubleshooting
item.description: Problems updating npm packages # Delete the ./node_modules folder, and run again: npm install Problems with cache # Delete the temporary directories: npm run clean

item.title: Generative AI Hack Demos
